about_the_game:
Underwater World is a game for people who like construction, land development and raw materials. In the game, you create an underwater civilization.


Advantages of the game:


Variety - lots of different buildings to build
Raw material extraction system - in order to develop, you need resources that you can obtain by using the mine and the bathyscaphe
Upgrade system - buildings can be upgraded to higher levels to extract more resources or generate more energy needed to build or expand more
Nice for the eye graphics - many great graphics, post processing and particle effects that enhance the game experience

Various surroundings - underwater animals such as sharks, whales, killer whales, and various objects on the bottom that wonderfully decorate the abyss of the ocean
Danger - The whirlpool can damage your buildings. Use force field generators to protect yourself!

Send on a bathyscaphe mining mission - you can send a bathyscaphe on mining missions for more resources
Connect residential and cargo buildings with tunnels - a system of tunnels thanks to which you can connect buildings so that they can function
Desktop wallpaper game - the game is displayed as wallpaper on the desktop so you can play in your spare time and watch our colony grow
Additional options for starting the game in a full-screen window.
Daily event- a daily event of searching for treasure chests

The game works stably under Windows 10 and Windows 11 !!!
